channel.title: sitespeed.io release feed
channel.description: Follow new releases of sitespeed.io tools
channel.copyright: All rights reserved 2021, Peter Hedenskog and team

item.title: sitespeed.io 19.4.2
item.description: Updated the Docker container to use Firefox 92 (instead of beta 92) Updated the base Docker container to use a newer updated version of Ubuntu 20.04. See #3456.

item.title: browsertime 14.2.1
item.description: Updated Geckodriver dependency that uses a newer version of the tar-package.

item.title: throttle 3.0.0
item.description: When you run on Mac OS we changed so localhost traffic is not throttled by default. To throttle on localhost use --localhost. This makes sence if you use WebDriver to drive your browser on your local machine. And Mac OS now works the same as Linux.

item.title: pagexray 4.3.1
item.description: Added missing inbodyparser_blocking render blocking info for Chrome.

item.title: coach-core 6.4.3
item.description: Updated to latest PageXray and Third patrty web 0.12.4.

item.title: coach 6.0.0
item.description: Use Browsertime 11.0.0 Use Coach-code 6.0 Use latest Firefox and Chrome

item.title: chrome-trace 0.2.2
item.description: Catch if we can't find the first thread event. We now throws an exception (that's not optimal since we don't know what's wrong) with the info of what's wrong. We can change that later on.

item.title: compare 1.0.0
item.description: Added support for using Github gists see #34. Added support for using a config file to configure which HARs to test. Added support for copy/paste directly you HAR, configuration file or a gist URL or id. Refactor the CSS into Sass, development build process now uses BrowserSync. Service worker added for offline support. Workbox is used to achieve this. Added support for showing changes in request/responses if you compare the same page #63. New internal structure and use the new configuration object all the way.
